name: Avoid using "print" function (PHP)
description: This quality rules searches all the Methods, Functions and Sections using the print function.
output:
This report lists all the Methods and Functions and PHP Sections containing a print function.
This QR provides the following information:
Method, Function and Section  full name.
rationale: Using “print” function the performances of your application can decrease considerably. Instead of using it is advised to use “echo” function. Both functions are used for the same thing but echo is the language constructs which return nothing, which print will return 0 or 1 based on success or failure.
remediation: Try to use "echo"  function instead of "print" function.
total: Number of Methods, Functions and Sections
